subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Carl Froch knocked out his British rival George Groves in the eighth round to retain his World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation super-middleweight titles in a rematch at Wembley Stadium in London.
snippet: Carl Froch knocked out his British rival George Groves in the eighth round to retain his World Boxing Association and International Boxing Federation super-middleweight titles in a rematch at Wembley Stadium in London.
